<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>95c44bca-a136-45c5-89e3-505768b78580#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az eladhatatlan tej sorsa</string>
            <string language="en">The fate of the unsalable milk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Schicksal der unsalable Milch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le destin du lait unsalable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fate do leite unsalable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il destino del latte unsalable</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μοίρα του αζήτητου γάλακτος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sino de la leche unsalable</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Utcára öntik a termelők az eladhatatlan tejet a világválság idején</string>
            <string language="en">Manufacturers pour the unsalable milk tot the streets druing the world crisis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gazdaság,  termékmegsemmisítés,  túltermelés,  </string>
            <string language="en">economi, destruction of product, over-production</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hersteller gießen das unsalable Milch tot die 
Straßen, welche die Weltkrise druing sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les constructeurs versent le tot unsalable de 
lait les rues druing la crise du monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os fabricantes derramam o tot unsalable do leite 
as ruas que druing a crise de mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I fornitori versano il tot unsalable del latte le
vie che druing la crisi di mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι κατασκευαστές χύνουν στο αζήτητο γάλα tot τις 
οδούς poy η παγκόσμια κρίση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los fabricantes vierten el tot unsalable de la 
leche las calles druing la crisis mundial</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">economi, Zerstörung des Produktes, Überproduktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">economi, destruction de produit, surproduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">economi, destruição do produto, over-production</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">economi, distruzione del prodotto, sovrapproduzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">economi, καταστροφή του προϊόντος, υπερπαραγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">economi, destrucción del producto, superproducción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
